short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set of QOL improvements for krfitness.veebindus.ee

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I hate doing manual clicks if they can be automated. The owner of the site hasn't shown interest in developing these features, claiming that it is not hard to click a button or look at the values.

But I need it to be fast, so I automated them.

Features:
1. You can set your default meal multiplier in the options of said extension
2. Clicking on a correct value it will fill in the product calculator fields.
3. If you have any notes they are shown as a default.
